1.text: Where do wars and fightings among you come from? Don’t they come from your pleasures that war in your members?

2.text: You lust, and don’t have. You kill, covet, and can’t obtain. You fight and make war. You don’t have, because you don’t ask.

3.text: You ask, and don’t receive, because you ask with wrong motives, so that you may spend it for your pleasures.

4.text: You adulterers and adulteresses, don’t you know that friendship with the world is enmity with God? Whoever therefore wants to be a friend of the world makes himself an enemy of God.

5.text: Or do you think that the Scripture says in vain, “The Spirit who lives in us yearns jealously”?

6.text: But he gives more grace. Therefore it says, “God resists the proud, but gives grace to the humble.”

7.text: Be subject therefore to God. But resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

8.text: Draw near to God, and he will draw near to you. Cleanse your hands, you sinners; and purify your hearts, you double-minded.

9.text: Lament, mourn, and weep. Let your laughter be turned to mourning, and your joy to gloom.

10.text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord, and he will exalt you.

11.text: Don’t speak against one another, brothers. He who speaks against a brother and judges his brother, speaks against the law and judges the law. But if you judge the law, you are not a doer of the law, but a judge.

12.text: Only one is the lawgiver, who is able to save and to destroy. But who are you to judge another?

13.text: Come now, you who say, “Today or tomorrow let’s go into this city, and spend a year there, trade, and make a profit.”

14.text: Whereas you don’t know what your life will be like tomorrow. For what is your life? For you are a vapor, that appears for a little time, and then vanishes away.

15.text: For you ought to say, “If the Lord wills, we will both live, and do this or that.”

16.text: But now you glory in your boasting. All such boasting is evil.

17.text: To him therefore who knows to do good, and doesn’t do it, to him it is sin.
